title: Irish Inspirations: Stories and Wisdom That Celebrate the Magic of the Emerald Isle
description: This memorable collection of personal stories from locals, tourists, and people of Irish descent allows readers to experience all the magic and beauty of the Emerald Isle. Each story offers a unique look at the country and culture of Ireland from its breathtaking landscape and friendly people to its rich traditions of food, drink, music, literature, and more. In addition to heartwarming stories, Irish Inspirations is filled with poems, Irish wisdom, fun facts, and even a recipe or two, making this unique anthology the perfect celebration of everything Irish.
author: Blue Mountain Arts Collection
